name: Abasteo
overview:
Abasteo.mx is a mexican online store with an exclusive focus on the B2B market. Its product portfolio includes more than 20,000 products in the area of electronics, printing and office supplies.

Its innovative approach of showing several warehouses per product gives their customers access to the best prices in Mexico.

The websites’ key functions include:

  • Possibility to autonomously create inquirys in PDF format through the website

  • Staggered prices for each product, giving the clients attractive volume discounts on-line

  • Ability to easy switch on each page between prices in- or excluding VAT

  • Numerous filter options in each category, making the buying decision process ever easier

The two main goals of Abasteo.mx are to streamline the purchasing process for its clients and to offer them the best possible market prices.
